ygData.subject: Re: Faction in Rivervale
ygData.msgSnippet: You don t even have to hit Mooto, just heal the person that is killing him.  They should definitely not have a problem with that!  I think a buff works as
ygData.messageBody:
You don't even have to hit Mooto, just heal the person that is killing
him. They should definitely not have a problem with that! I think a
buff works as well.


>From: "Anne Falbo-Ortiz" <topaaz_ladyjay@...>
>
>ok i was there a long time heres what i know-- killing mooto gives ya 20
>points (something like that) handing in DFB and war beads gives ya a point
>or two apeice so from lvl 10 to 14 i killed mootoo and the 2 gobs that
>spawn with him if i am alone there, also if there are others there who are
>killing mooto-ask them if ya can hit him once--you also get the faction if
>ya do that good luck
